In patients with traumatic injuries with no unstable cervical spine injury on CT but with high risk features, maintain C-spine precautions.  High Risk features include:   - Glasgow Coma Scale of 8 or less  - Diffuse axonal injury  - Basal skull fracture  - LeFort 2 to 3 fracture  - Cervical transverse process fracture  - Major thoracic inlet trauma (fractures of ribs 1 to 2; upper T-spine fracture; scapular fracture)
